ygData.subject: Plane of Hate Items
ygData.msgSnippet: i was wondering if anyone has heard of our imbrued platemail armor being dropped in the Plane of Hate yet.  supposedly it was moved there from the Plane of
ygData.messageBody:
i was wondering if anyone has heard of our imbrued platemail armor being
dropped in the Plane of Hate yet. supposedly it was moved there from the
Plane of Fear, along with warrior, shaman, paladin, rogue, magician, and
enchanter items. Boogeymen in PoF definitely drop necromancer armor now,
but so far no imbrued has been found in PoH on my server. not that PoH is
not good for bards, in fact they definitely thought of us here (for a
change). so far i have gotten these bard only items in PoH...

Six Note Blade: 1h slashing, dmg11 del25 wt3, found on the Maestro of
Rancor, looks like a ykesha.

Kelin's Seven Stringed Lute: +9dex, +15cha, +9agi, also found on the Maestro
of Rancor, still very forgetful to test its effects, though i think at 25hp
per pulse sitting with hymn, there is an improvement.

Martune Rapier: Piercing, dmg8 del23 +5str +4agi off a scorn banshee (i
assumed these banshees would have imbrued, though they have only had rapiers
so far).

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L29 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L21 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server
